analysis: The project is a test website focused on black holes with a cosmic theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for interactive elements. The theme needs to be enhanced with black hole visuals, animations, and a cosmic aesthetic. The CSS file should include dark, cosmic colors, animations for black hole visuals, and interactive elements. The JavaScript file should handle animations and interactions related to black holes.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including black hole animations, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use CSS variables for cosmic colors like deep purples, blues, and blacks. Add keyframe animations for black hole visuals and interactive elements.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive black hole visuals, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript file to handle animations and interactions related to black holes. Implement functions for animated slides, interactive black hole visuals, and smooth transitions. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality.
